post.text: The State Department's quid pro quo scheme proves how CORRUPT our system is. Attempting to protect Crooked Hillary, NOT our American service members or national security information, is absolutely DISGRACEFUL. The American people deserve so much better. On November 8th, we will END this RIGGED system once and for all!

comment.author: Lacey
comment.text: WikiLeaks Julian Assange has lost internet access for posting the truth about Hillary. Whose internet access is next to be cut off? Please stop allowing Hillary and her corrupt campaign to stop you from delivering your message to Make America Great Again! We know there is some voter fraud, the media is spinning everything you say on that topic. Get on with winning this race.

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: No I think Ecuador decided he was no longer a whistleblower but pushing a Russian favored candidate.

replies.author: Lacey
replies.text: Read all the evidence. Don't cover your eyes from the truth.

replies.author: Brandon
replies.text: Julian Assange is back up and running again .... more on Hilary. Surely he has the Big One Coming!

replies.author: Brandon
replies.text: Everyone should change their Profile Picture to Trump!!! Wouldn't that be a Big Statement to the World. Unite the Trump Supporters!
